message:
Hi guys, 

The GM asked me to find a way for a rapid development cross platform system.. He wants to increase the productivity but I have concerns regarding the ready made tools rather I want a tool that can generate cross platform code but give me the ability to customize the code and add an architectural touch on it. 

Could you help please?

data.message: There are no silver bullets. Even the choice to go crossplatform vs native depends on what you are doing and how you want to achieve it. Generic requests like "increased productivity" are usually a sign of bad things to come. What exactly is your GM trying to achieve?
Cross platform for what? Desktop, mobile?
I would go with React, React Native & Electron
